question: An address system that keeps track of web documents and specifies where a resource can be found on the internet
A network transfer protocol to find documents between a server and the browser
A text string tied to an URL, used to jump from one document to another.
It provies a human-readable address to access a website on the internet
Unique address or identifier that belongs to a device linked to a network, it's made of a series of numbers separated by dots
A computer that stores a website's component files, it's connected to the internect and supports data interchange with other devices connected to the web
A global system that takes a human-readable name and translates it into it's IP
A worldwide network of connections between machines
Interconnected system of public webpages that uses the HTTP protocol
Descriptive language that specifies a webpage structure and semantics
